>
[Song of the Fallen](/Feats.aspx?ID=1168) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 76</row>

**Prerequisites**
focus pool

</column>

---

The moving power of your songs can stir the spirits of the dead to rise once more and fight alongside you. You learn the [_song of the fallen_](/Spells.aspx?ID=563) composition spell. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.

<title level="2">Paragons of Promise</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 75</row>

The citizens of Promise represent some of the most capable experts, greatest minds, and powerful warriors on Golarion—ideal teachers and trainers for PCs who want to maximize their own potential. If the PCs secure Visitor’s Pins or an alliance with Mengkare, their access to Promise’s trainers and records unlock all of the following uncommon class feats.

**Related Feats**: [Apex Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1160), [Aura of Unbreakable Virtue](/Feats.aspx?ID=1161), [Bloodline Metamorphosis](/Feats.aspx?ID=1162), [Efficient Alchemy (Paragon)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1163), [Emblazon Divinity](/Feats.aspx?ID=1164), [Enduring Debilitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1165), [Golden Body](/Feats.aspx?ID=1166), [Spell Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=1843), [Superior Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=1170), [Ultimate Flexibility](/Feats.aspx?ID=1732), [Unstoppable Juggernaut](/Feats.aspx?ID=1631)
